Name: Water tank| 貯水槽
About the game: One day, a year has passed since his wife disappeared. The protagonist decides to sever his hopes that his wife will come back to him by discarding memories of the two of them and He decides to discard the memories and painful memories of his wife's disappearance in order to break his hopes for her return. What to throw away is left to the player. ◆Game System The player controls the husband who decides to say goodbye to the past, and decipher the truth while choosing whether or not to throw away the items. The game is a psychological horror game. The game has a short multi-ending system with 10 different endings depending on the items you throw away and the choices you make. The game is a short multi-ending system. The game contains elements of a walking simulator in which you move around the map. The story changes as you discard items. The game is a fictional story that has nothing to do with any actual incidents or accidents. We welcome your live game streaming. No prior notice is required, but please include the URL of the store page in the summary section of the distribution page.
